markdownRemark.html:
When you need to present your model for 3D printing community, you need an illustration made in the style like technical instructions. Also can be called CAD style or technical drawing.

What does it mean in 3D modelling terms?

  • white environment
  • white material
  • no shadows
  • no reflection
  • black outline across all edges
